original_text: But when the sound is one short sound, the tribes on the east side of the camp must start to travel.
korean_text: 너희가 그것을 크게 불 때에는 동쪽 진영들이 행진할 것이며

sentences.original_text: But when the sound is one short sound
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 소리가 한 번의 짧은 소리일 때

sentences.original_text: the tribes on the east side of the camp
